text: Ezɨ Judaba Polɨn akam baraghan aghuaghava, mɨgɨrɨgɨar kuraba a ganɨdi. Ezɨ a kamaghɨn amighava, uan korotiamɨn mɨneziba pɨzigha, egha kamaghɨn me mɨgei, “Kamaghɨn ia Godɨn saghon ikɨ oveghtɨ, mar ian osɨmtɨzimra. Ezɨ kɨ uabɨ osɨmtɨziba puvatɨ. Datɨrɨghɨn kɨ Godɨn akar aghuim Kantrin Igharazibar Gumaziba me mɨkɨnam.”
